`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Manali is a popular hill station nestled in the mountains of the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. It is situated in the Kullu district at an altitude of around 2,050 meters (6,726 feet) above sea level. Known for its breathtaking natural beauty, lush green valleys, snow-capped peaks, and meandering rivers, Manali is a favored destination for tourists, honeymooners, and adventure enthusiasts."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:13,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Solang Valley: Famous for its adventure sports like paragliding, skiing, and zorbing, Solang Valley is a picturesque spot near Manali."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:122,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Rohtang Pass: This high mountain pass, located about 51 kilometers from Manali, offers stunning views of the surrounding mountains and valleys. It's a popular destination for snow activities during the winter months."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:124,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.li,{children:[`
`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Hadimba Temple: Dedicated to Hadimba Devi, wife of Bhima from the Indian epic Mahabharata, this ancient temple is known for its unique architecture and serene surroundings."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:126,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.li,{children:[`
`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Old Manali: Known for its hippie culture, cafes, and vibrant atmosphere, Old Manali offers a more laid-back experience compared to the bustling streets of New Manali."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:128,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.li,{children:[`
`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Vashisht Hot Springs: Situated around 6 kilometers from Manali, these natural hot water springs are believed to have medicinal properties and are frequented by tourists seeking relaxation."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e0180104-9093-4204-b261-342f62b682bf.mdx",lineNumber:130,columnNumber:3},this),`
